title: Sample Proportion of Fair Die
question_text: Suppose Tony tosses a fair die $90\text{ times}$ . Of these $90\text{ tosses}$ , $18$ resulted in a $1$ showing face-up on the die. What is the sample proportion, and what is the mean of the sampling distribution?

choices.text: Sample proportion = 20 % 20 % Mean of sampling distribution = 16.67 % 16.67 %
